versos: (journeys) Psalm 84:5 - "Blessed are those whose strength is in you, who have set their hearts on pilgrimage.";;;
(spirit) Proverbs 1:23 - "Repent at my rebuke Then I will pour out my thoughts to you, I will make known to you my teachings.";;;
(strife) Proverbs 17:14 - "Starting a quarrel is like breaching a dam; so drop the matter before a dispute breaks out.";;;
(herdmen) Genesis 46:32 - "And the men are shepherds, for their trade has been to feed livestock; and they have brought their flocks, their herds, and all that they have.";;;
(dwelled) "And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us, and we have seen his glory, glory as of the only Son from the Father, full of grace and truth." - John 1:14;;;
(thyself) Matthew 22:39 - And the second is like unto it
(lifted) John 12:32 - "And I, when I am lifted up from the earth, will draw all people to myself.";;;
(zoar) Genesis 19:22 - "But flee there quickly, because I cannot do anything until you reach it." That is why the town was called zoar.";;;
(cities) 1 Chronicles 6:57 - "To the descendants of Aaron they gave the following towns with their pasturelands.";;;
(sinners) Luke 5:32 - "I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.";;;
(rebuked) Mark 8:33 - But when Jesus turned and looked at his disciples, he rebuked Peter. "Get behind me, Satan" he said. "You do not have in mind the concerns of God, but merely human concerns.";;;
(mizpah) Genesis 31:49 - "It was also called mizpah, because he said, 'May the LORD keep watch between you and me when we are away from each other.'";;;

(westward) "And the standard of the camp of the people of Dan, moving forward according to their by their companies, shall be set out last, the standard of the camp of the people of Dan by their companies." - Numbers 2:31;;;
(seest) Job 10:4 - Have you eyes of flesh Do you see as man sees;;;
(womb) Luke 1:42 - "In a loud voice she exclaimed: 'Blessed are you among women, and blessed is the child you will bear'";;;
(arise) Isaiah 60:1 - "arise, shine; for your light has come, And the glory of the Lord has risen upon you.";;;
